Title: hesiod: Root privilege escalation
Synopsis:
A vulnerability was discovered in hesiod which may allow remote
    attackers to gain root privileges.

Background.Text: DNS functionality to access to DB of information that changes infrequently.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in hesiod that have remained unaddressed. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Impact.Text: A remote or local attacker may be able to escalate privileges to root.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text:
Gentoo has discontinued support for hesiod and recommends that users
      unmerge the package:
